snippet.title: MegaWorld Express Alpha - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
MegaWorld - the oldest Web3 game (formerly MegaCryptoPolis), 100% on-chain autonomous city builder and player-governed virtual world with real economics introduces Early Access for its Express free-to-play mode. 

https://www.megaworld.io

Discover 3 cities built by players since 2018, construct buildings to produce Resources that are required by other buildings to be constructed and operate, start your career as a Courier and do delivery orders to help buildings boost their production.
